sectionHeading: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday March 27 at 4:00 p.m.

incidentType: Traffic Advisory for Paris Pike at Johnston Rd:
location: Outbound Paris Pike is shutdown until further notice for investigation of an earlier serious injury collision at Iron Works Pike.

incidentType: Traffic Advisory for Paris Pike at Johnston Rd:
location: Outbound traffic being redirected to inbound Paris Pike.  One inbound lane also expected to be blocked.

incidentType: Traffic Advisory for Paris Pike at Johnston Rd:
location: Update 11:00 a.m. - Roadway remains shutdown at this time.

incidentType: Traffic Advisory for Paris Pike at Johnston Rd:
location: Update 11:37 a.m. - CLEAR.  Roadway is now OPEN.
